name: ROBIN DL4S Profile

importPlugin.comment: GDTF fixture type ID: f5 f6 b8 a6 e1 cb 43 bb 9d 6f 71 d5 da 5d 44 2c

comment: Extending the possibilities of the playful, colorful DLS Profile, the new DL4S is equipped with enhanced version of the ROBE RGBW LED module for brighter saturated colours and more powerful output.

capabilities.comment: Time from 0,2 s to 25,4 sec / Speed from max to min

RoboSpot disabled - except handle faders and pan/tilt
Theatre mode - automatic control of fan noise
Theatre mode - fan noise control from min to max

Rainbow effect(without fade time) from slow - > fast

capability.comment: Speed of rot gobo selection from max to min (0 - 255sec)
